rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Room
rooms.description: Large entrance hall connecting to living room. Includes eco-friendly lighting with energy-efficient LED fixtures, natural ventilation design.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen and living area. Designed for family gatherings, incorporates sustainable materials.

rooms.name: Open Concept Kitchen
rooms.description: Energy-efficient appliances and modern design with a focus on ventilation and natural lighting.

openings.description: Eco-friendly glass door with minimal frame for maximum light, aligned with Vastu's auspicious east-northeast direction if needed.
Spacious balcony access to each bedroom ensuring natural ventilation and sunlight as per local building norms.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with attached private balcony on the east side, optimized for privacy and sunlight.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom designed for joint family members with a dedicated balcony on the west side to ensure natural light.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom with integrated balcony and eco-friendly features like energy-efficient windows.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Smaller bedroom for visitors or joint family members, featuring a modest balcony.

openings.description: Balconies designed with safety railings and greenery space to promote sustainability.
Staircase connecting all floors, ensuring structural integrity and emergency exit compliance.

rooms.name: Study Room / Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated space for work and study with ergonomic design, natural light emphasis.

rooms.name: Multipurpose Hall
rooms.description: Large open area for family gatherings or as a recreational zone. Includes eco-friendly insulation materials.

openings.description: Eco-friendly roof garden that doubles as a social space, promoting sustainability and energy efficiency.
Staircase ensuring safe transition between floors and serving as an emergency exit.
